author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Department of Posts will conduct a circle-level ‘Dak Adalat’ on March 18 at 3 p.m. in the office of the Chief Postmaster General, Tamil Nadu Circle, Anna Salai, Chennai.

A release from the Chief Postmaster General said the Adalat is held to hear grievances of customers of postal department personally and redress their grievances. Customers may send their grievances on Postal Services to S. Vasudevan, Assistant Director (SB and FS), O/o The Chief Postmaster General, Tamil Nadu Circle, Chennai 600-002 on or before March 8. Customers can also send their grievances through email atadpgtn@gmail.comwith the subject line Dak Adalat.
title: Dak Adalat
